# La Renaissance Apartments

La Renaissance Apartments is an apartment building located at 424 Spadina Crescent East in the Central Business District of Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada. Completed in 1983, the building stands at 24 stories (79.2 meters) tall, making it the second-tallest structure in the city. It houses a total of 96 condominium units. It is similar in design to Regina's and Saskatchewan's tallest building, the Delta Regina Hotel.

* Delta Hotels Saskatoon Downtown
